speaker.whotheyare: Martin Reeves is chairman of the BCG Henderson Institute (BHI), BCG's think tank for new ideas in strategy and management.
speaker.whylisten: Martin Reeves' research spans topics such as creativity and strategy, resilience, corporate vitality, ambidexterity, social polarization and ecosystem strategy. He is coauthor of The Imagination Machine, Your Strategy Needs a Strategy and the Inspiring the Next Game collection as well as the host of BHI's podcast show, Thinkers & Ideas.
